message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think it's perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $11,500. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your suggestion, but I'm hoping to keep my budget under $10,000 if possible. Would you consider lowering the price?
Bob, I understand your budget, but unfortunately, $9,800 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500 to make this work. What do you say?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $10,200. I hope this meets your expectations.
